mapper.sql: id, module_id, parent_id, en_code, full_name, icon, url_address, target, type, allow_expand, is_public, allow_edit, allow_delete, status, sort_code, is_delete, available, description, delete_reason, permission_name, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by
mapper.select: select p.id, p.module_id, p.parent_id, p.en_code, p.full_name, p.target, r.id roleId from permissions p inner join roles_permissions rp on rp.permission = p.permission_name inner join user_roles r on r.role_name = rp.role_name

select p.id, p.module_id, p.parent_id, p.en_code, p.full_name, p.target, r.id roleId from permissions p inner join roles_permissions rp on rp.permission = p.permission_name inner join user_roles r on r.role_name = rp.role_name where r.id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update permissions
